location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Evelyn Baring, Private Secretary's Office, Government House, Calcutta to Sir Lewis Pelly, CSI, Agent to the Governor-General for Rajpootana [Rājasthān]

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a letter which Pelly had sent to Charles Umpherston Aitchison regarding the re-employment of Captain Donald Robertson at Ajmere [Ajmer], and informing him that Captain Robertson will be borne in mind should any vacancy arise. The letter also informs Pelly that Lieutenant Talbot has already been appointed as a Political Assistant.
